description: These wholesome pancakes have a little extra tang from the blueberries.
name: Oatmeal Blueberry Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, combine the oats and oat milk and leave to soak overnight in the fridge. The next day, mash the blueberries and bananas and combine with the soaked oats.
Add the vanilla extract and baking powder to the mixture and combine fully. Heat up a nonstick pan to a medium heat with the coconut oil and fry some of the mixture for 4 minutes.
Flip the pancake over and cook the other side for a further 3 minutes before removing from the heat. Serve with a drizzle of agave syrup and fruit if desired.
